name: Air Elemental
description: An Air Elemental is a swirling, translucent mass of wind and vapor, capable of generating powerful gusts and whirlwinds. Its form may condense into a vaguely humanoid shape with swirling arms and legs made of pure air.
memorable: Its ability to suffocate foes by creating a vortex of air and move through narrow spaces makes it a challenging opponent.
goals: To embody the chaotic essence of air and engage in combat when provoked.
relations: Related to other elemental creatures; may be found in environments influenced by air or wind.
environment: Typically found in open skies or places with strong winds.
strengths: Highly mobile with the ability to pass through tight spaces and immunity to poison and certain conditions.
weaknesses: Average physical strength and intelligence may limit interaction outside of combat.
attacks: Can perform two slam attacks or unleash a whirlwind that damages and displaces enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Whirlwind allows it to carry creatures away and deal damage while evading opportunity attacks.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and keen perception in stealthy conditions.
skills: While it lacks specific bonuses in skills, its ability to stealthily navigate clouds and fog enhances its evasion.
additional_information: Immune to conditions such as paralysis and unconsciousness.
Can manipulate the battlefield with its whirlwind ability.
Can engage in prolonged encounters without needing air, food, or sleep.
Can deal thunder damage with its Thunderous Retreat reaction.
Moves freely through other creatures' spaces, increasing its tactical options.
